title: Kat in Zombieland
description: Kat Parker is dead. And awesome. But mostly dead. She's become a Witness, a spirit with a single save her ex-boyfriend Frosty and win the war against zombies. Okay, she has two goals.Devastated by the loss of Kat, Frosty the zombie slayer chases one dangerous situation after another. He is locked in a fierce battle of good against evil, light against dark, and his recklessness has put him on a collision course with destruction. Not even his fellow slayers can help him. But Kat is determined, and she's willing to do whatever it takes to succeed. Even putting Frosty in the path of a new love...Previously excerpted on Wattpad, this never-before published novella set in the White Rabbit Chronicles world provides readers with Kat's point of view during the events of A Mad Zombie Party.
author: Gena Showalter
